text: Kogda Nashi yasnyye ayaty chitayut tem, kotoryye ne nadeyutsya na vstrechu s Nami, oni govoryat: «Prinesi nam drugoy Koran ili zameni yego!». Skazhi: «Ne podobayet mne zamenyat' yego po svoyemu zhelaniyu. YA lish' sleduyu tomu, chto vnushayetsya mne v otkrovenii, i boyus', chto yesli ya oslushayus' Gospoda moyego, to menya postignut mucheniya v Velikiy den'»
